mapper.select: SELECT t.f_id, t.f_code, t.f_name, t.f_abb, t.f_url, t.f_path, t.f_type, t.f_icon, t.f_order, t.f_parent, t.f_visible, (CASE WHEN (t.f_parent = '#' OR t.f_parent = '0') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as f_root, ( SELECT wm_concat(t1.opt_perms) FROM sys_feature_opts t1 WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id) f_perms FROM SYS_FEATURE_LIST t WHERE t.f_visible = 1 START WITH t.f_parent = 0 CONNECT BY t.f_parent = PRIOR t.f_id

SELECT distinct t.f_id, t.f_name, t.f_abb, t.f_code, t.f_url, t.f_path, t.f_type, t.f_icon, t.f_order, t.f_parent, t.f_visible, (CASE WHEN (t.f_parent = '#' OR t.f_parent = '0') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as f_root, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(t1.f_id) FROM sys_feature_opts t1 INNER JOIN sys_authz_role_perms x ON (x.perms = t1.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id AND x.role_id = #{roleId} ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) f_checked, (SELECT wm_concat(t1.opt_perms) perms FROM sys_feature_opts t1 INNER JOIN sys_authz_role_perms x ON ( x.perms = t1.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id AND x.role_id = #{roleId} ) f_perms FROM SYS_FEATURE_LIST t WHERE t.f_visible = 1 START WITH t.f_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT t1.f_id FROM sys_feature_opts t1 INNER JOIN sys_authz_role_perms x ON (x.perms = t1.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id AND x.role_id = #{roleId} ) CONNECT BY PRIOR t.f_parent = t.f_id ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(t.f_id) ASC

SELECT distinct t.f_id, t.opt_id, t.opt_name, t.opt_icon, t.opt_order, t.opt_visible, t.opt_perms, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(x.perms) FROM sys_authz_role_perms x WHERE x.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ( x.perms = t.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) opt_checked FROM sys_feature_opts t

SELECT t.f_id, t.f_name, t.f_abb, t.f_code, t.f_url, t.f_path, t.f_type, t.f_icon, t.f_order, t.f_parent, t.f_visible, (CASE WHEN (t.f_parent = '#' OR t.f_parent = '0') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as f_root, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(t1.f_id) FROM sys_feature_opts t1 INNER JOIN sys_authz_role_perms x ON (x.perms = t1.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id AND x.role_id = #{roleId} ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) f_checked, (SELECT wm_concat(t1.opt_perms) perms FROM sys_feature_opts t1 INNER JOIN sys_authz_role_perms x ON ( x.perms = t1.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') WHERE t1.f_id = t.f_id AND x.role_id = #{roleId} ) f_perms FROM SYS_FEATURE_LIST t WHERE t.f_visible = 1 START WITH t.f_parent = #{servId} CONNECT BY t.f_parent = PRIOR t.f_id

SELECT distinct t.f_id, t.opt_id, t.opt_name, t.opt_icon, t.opt_order, t.opt_visible, t.opt_perms, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(x.perms) FROM sys_authz_role_perms x WHERE x.role_id = #{roleId} AND ( x.perms = t.opt_perms or x.perms = '*' or x.perms = '*:*') ) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) opt_checked FROM sys_feature_opts t INNER JOIN sys_authz_role_perms t2 ON (t2.perms = t.opt_perms or t2.perms = '*' or t2.perms = '*:*') WHERE t2.role_id = #{roleId}
